report.ceiling_analysis: The student struggled during the Level-Up phase when asked to elaborate on their experiences, indicating a lack of comfort with more complex narrative tasks.

domain_analyses.observation: The student demonstrates moderate fluency but hesitates when asked to elaborate on experiences, leading to longer pauses.

verbal_summary:
Based on our conversation, I've assessed your Korean proficiency at A2 level. You performed well during the Level-Up phase. The student struggled during the Level-Up phase when asked to elaborate on their experiences, indicating a lack of comfort with more complex narrative tasks. 
Let me break down the key areas: Your strongest area is fluency with a rating of 3 out of 5. The student demonstrates moderate fluency but hesitates when asked to elaborate on experiences, leading to longer pauses. An area to focus on is coherence, rated at 2 out of 5. The student has difficulty organizing thoughts coherently when prompted to provide more detail, leading to fragmented responses. 
I recommend starting with the Basic Narrative Skills module. The top patterns to work on are: 1. Expand vocabulary to include more descriptive terms for experiences. 2. Practice forming complex sentences to improve narrative coherence. 
For practice, I suggest this exercise: Engage in Picture Narration exercises to encourage detailed descriptions and improve fluency. 
You're making good progress! Keep practicing regularly.
